keywords: Cooking Light The Complete Quick Cook
name: Cooking Light The Complete Quick Cook's Roasted Cauliflower, Chickpeas, and Olives
description: For this Roasted Cauliflower, Chickpeas, and Olives the oven is cranked up to a scorching 450°, a temperature that browns the cauliflower florets to a golden crisp, roasts the roughly chopped garlic giving at a mellow spice, and renders the olives and chickpeas crunchy-chewy all in about 22 minutes. It's one of those fantastically simple sides that can be tossed together in a manner of minutes but once it comes out of the oven is filled with wonderfully complex tastes and textures.
recipeIngredient: 10 green Spanish olives, halved and pitted
1 (15-ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Combine first 4 ingredients in a shallow roasting pan. Drizzle with oil; sprinkle with pepper. Toss well to coat. Bake at 450° for 22 minutes or until cauliflower is browned and crisp-tender, stirring after 10 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley.
